thread.title: 5-year-old photographer reaches 140,000 Instagram followers

author: Jack Sommer, Business Insider
title: 5-year-old photographer reaches 140,000 Instagram followers
text: 5-year-old photographer reaches 140,000 Instagram followers Comment By Jack Sommer, Business Insider Ridgecrest Daily Independent - Ridgecrest, CA By Jack Sommer, Business Insider Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 1:38 PM By Jack Sommer, Business Insider Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 1:38 PM When Aaron Huey , a National Geographic photographer, started making his way around the West Coast in 2014, he wanted to share the fun with his then 4-year-old son, Hawkeye. He bought Hawkeye a camera and was instantly filled with joy at seeing his son's perspective. "At the age of four, I think Hawkeye was open to just about anything. We also shoot bow and arrows, play with Legos, and draw," Huey told Business Insider. "We were just a father and son going on our first big trip away from Mom." Now five years old, Hawkeye has more than 139,000 followers on an Instagram account run by his father. Like Huey, Hawkeye is now represented by National Geographic. The two are currently raising money via Kickstarter to fund Hawkeyeâ€™s first book of published work . Their initial goal was $35,000, but they've already raised more than $37,000 with just one day left to go. Visit Business Insider to see more of Hawkeye's work. By Jack Sommer, Business Insider Ridgecrest Daily Independent - Ridgecrest, CA By Jack Sommer, Business Insider Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 1:38 PM
